metadata.title: CVE-2018-10393 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
bark_noise_hybridmp in psy.c in Xiph.Org libvorbis 1.3.6 has a stack-based buffer over-read.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-10393` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvorbis0a - 1.3.6-2
libvorbisenc2 - 1.3.6-2
libvorbisfile3 - 1.3.6-2
No subscription required

notes.note: mdeslaur> same patch as CVE-2017-14160 rodrigo-zaiden> there is a recent follow up commit that could also be added when patching this CVE (and CVE-2017-14160) https://gitlab.xiph.org/xiph/vorbis/commit/a9eb99a5 focal does not have this last patch, but with the first patch, I understand that it is safe enough.

criterions.comment: libvorbis package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.6-2').
